title: CRISPR reveals the secret life of antimicrobial peptides

title_detail.value: CRISPR reveals the secret life of antimicrobial peptides

summary: Using CRISPR, scientists have carried out extensive work on a little-known yet effective weapon of the innate immune system, antimicrobial peptides.

summary_detail.value: Using CRISPR, scientists have carried out extensive work on a little-known yet effective weapon of the innate immune system, antimicrobial peptides.
